mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO base ( taskName, pageId, url,
c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, c9, c10, c11, c12, c13, c14, c15, c16, c17, c18, c19, c20, c21, c22, c23, c24, c25, c26, c27, c28, c29, c30, c31, c32, c33, c34, c35, c36, c37, c38, c39, c40, c41, c42, c43, c44, c45, c46, c47, c48, c49, c50 )
VALUES ( #{item.taskName}, #{item.pageId}, #{item.url},
#{item.c1}, #{item.c2}, #{item.c3}, #{item.c4}, #{item.c5}, #{item.c6}, #{item.c7}, #{item.c8}, #{item.c9}, #{item.c10}, #{item.c11}, #{item.c12}, #{item.c13}, #{item.c14}, #{item.c15}, #{item.c16}, #{item.c17}, #{item.c18}, #{item.c19}, #{item.c20}, #{item.c21}, #{item.c22}, #{item.c23}, #{item.c24}, #{item.c25}, #{item.c26}, #{item.c27}, #{item.c28}, #{item.c29}, #{item.c30}, #{item.c31}, #{item.c32}, #{item.c33}, #{item.c34}, #{item.c35}, #{item.c36}, #{item.c37}, #{item.c38}, #{item.c39}, #{item.c40}, #{item.c41}, #{item.c42}, #{item.c43}, #{item.c44}, #{item.c45}, #{item.c46}, #{item.c47}, #{item.c48}, #{item.c49}, #{item.c50} )
mapper.select: select pageId from base where taskName = #{taskName}
